segments.text: I glance into the kitchen and see this woman just standing there drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her back half-turned, completely focused on that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh my gosh, the sink is overflowing right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out like a waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a huge puddle spreading around her feet, and she hasn't even noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her shoes is already soaked, but she's just polishing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now look at those kids over by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's up on this wobbly stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's standing there with her hand out, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking cookies while mom's oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside, all calm and pretty.
segments.speaker: PAR
